title: Hard N Heavy TV (1993) 20 EP. HARD ROCK INTERVIEWS PERFORMANCES
description:
Hard N Heavy TV (1993) 20 EP. HARD ROCK INTERVIEWS PERFORMANCES 


Hard N Heavy' was a hard rock and heavy metal music program from E1 Entertainment that aired in 1994. The first season aired 20 hour long episodes full of rare archival rock concert footage and interviews with bands and musicians.





Hard N Heavy
"Raw"
Season 1 Episode 1 (55:19)
Aired on 03/04/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with JaneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Addiction, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Public EnemyBlack Crowes, Nirvana, Faith No More, Chainsaw Kittens, My Sister's Machine and Megadeth. 


Hard N Heavy
"Fired Up"
Season 1 Episode 2 (55:35)
Aired on 03/04/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Alice In Chains, Voivod, Tribe After Tribe, Living Colour, Testament, Anthrax, Extreme, King's X, and Queensryche. 



Hard N Heavy
"No Fear"
Season 1 Episode 3 (56:28)
Aired on 03/04/1993 M
Historic performances & interviews with superstar bands such as Black Sabbath, Iron Maiden and Kiss. 



Hard N Heavy
"Rock USA"
Season 1 Episode 4 (57:48)
Aired on 03/06/1993 M
Historic performances & interviews with superstar bands such as Soundgarden, Alice in Chains and Anthrax. 


Hard N Heavy
"Axe Men"
Season 1 Episode 5 (55:07)
Aired on 03/06/1993 M
Historic performances & interviews with superstar bands such as Aerosmith, Cheap Trick and Damn Yankees. 


Hard N Heavy
"Alternative One"
Season 1 Episode 6 (55:54)
Aired on 03/11/1993 M
Historic performances & interviews with superstar bands such as Dogs, D'Amour, Jane's Addiction and Smashing Pumpkins. 



Hard N Heavy
"Legends On Film"
Season 1 Episode 7 (54:39)
Aired on 03/04/1993 M
Historic performances & interviews with superstar bands such as Queen, Led Zeppelin and Spinal Tap. 


Hard N Heavy
"Classic Trax"
Season 1 Episode 8 (57:37)
Aired on 03/11/1993 M
Historic performances & interviews with superstar bands such as The Doors, Thin Lizzy and Whitesnake. 


Hard N Heavy
"Sessions"
Season 1 Episode 9 (55:09)
Aired on 03/11/1993 M
Historic performances & interviews with superstar bands such as Scorpions, Kix and Great White. 


Hard N Heavy
"Sex"
Season 1 Episode 10 (54:56)
Aired on 03/11/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Axl Rose, Slash, Dog's D'amour, Tyla, Jane's Addiction, Lita Ford, Bang Tango, Femme Fatal, Roxx Gang, Doro Pesch, Winger, Rhett, L.A. Guns, Enuff ZÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Nuff & Slaughter. 


Hard N Heavy
"Power Surge"
Season 1 Episode 11 (55:35)
Aired on 03/12/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Skid Row, Cinderella, Poison's Brett Michaels, Faster Pussy Cat, Michael Monroe, Kik Tracee and David Lee Roth. 



Hard N Heavy
"Trashed"
Season 1 Episode 12 (55:44)
Aired on 03/12/1993 Not Rated
Historic performances & interviews with superstar bands such as Prophecy of Doom, Armed Forces and Overkill. 



Hard N Heavy
"Live and Dangerous"
Season 1 Episode 13 (54:23)
Aired on 03/12/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Thunder, Whitesnake's David Coverdale, London Quireboys, Poison's Bret Michaels, Aerosmith's Joe Perry, Iron Maiden Guns nÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Roses 



Hard N Heavy
"Alternative Two"
Season 1 Episode 14 (55:22)
Aired on 03/18/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Nirvana, Skatenigs, Masters of Reality, Raging Slab, Life Sex & Death, Helmet, White Zombie, Lemmy from Motorhead and Mother Love Bone.



Hard N Heavy
"NU4U"
Season 1 Episode 15 (54:39)
Aired on 03/12/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Warrant, Black Crowes, London Quireboys, Silent Rage, Roxx Gang, Sea Haggs, Hardly Dangerous, L7, Annihilator, Gun, Wolfsbane, The Almighty, Thunder, Law & Order, Saigon Kick and Primus. 




Hard N Heavy
"Speed Thrills"
Season 1 Episode 16 (54:57)
Aired on 03/13/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Judas Priest, Sacred Reich, Megadeth, Steve Jones of Sex Pistols, Lemmy of Motorhead, Danzig, Celtic Frost, Vio-Lence, Death Angel and Naked Age. 



Hard N Heavy
"Monsters"
Season 1 Episode 17 (55:56)
Aired on 03/17/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Iron Maiden, Queensryche, Megadeth, The Cult Part 1, W.A.S.P., Ratt, Motley Crue, The Cult Part 2, Motorhead and Deep Purple 



Hard N Heavy
"Hard Core"
Season 1 Episode 18 (56:48)
Aired on 03/17/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Gwar, Anthrax/S.O.D., Exodus, Bodycount/Ice-T, Judas Priest, Carcass, Sepultura, Biohazard and Megadeth. 



Hard N Heavy
"Overkill"
Season 1 Episode 19 (55:09)
Aired on 03/17/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Pantera, Public Enemy, Suicidal Tendencies, Queensryche, Bodycount and Ice-T. 


Hard N Heavy
"Trick or Treat"
Season 1 Episode 20 (55:30)
Aired on 03/18/1993 M
Exclusive performance footage and interviews with Ozzy Osbourne, Skid Row, Lemmy from Motorhead, Michael Monroe, David Lee Roth, Lita Ford, Hunter/Ronson, KISS, L.A.Guns, Billy Sheehan from Mr. Big and Rob Halford from Judas Priest.
